body:
Comment 6 by **jon.forums**: 
On a whim, just tried a `cd src && clean.bat && cd ..`, ran my script, and now all
appears OK.

I'm wondering if it was just a fluke on my system, or whether something is now causing
old artifacts to not be cleaned by the .bat's.

I'll play with updating my working directory backward/forward to see if I can get it to
fail again. If it does fail, I'll get you valid mod times for malloc.goc and
zmalloc_linux_386.c
